data.name: دی دی هالیدیز
data.description: DDHolidays is a DMC division of Dreamdays with its headquarters in the UAE, and as one of the DMC’s in the region, we believe that our people are a major part of our success; they are chosen for their ability to make the difference in every aspect of our service to you.  DDHolidays aims to provide a comprehensive travel and holiday experience which is truly memorable and 100% hassle free. We offer a wide range of products and services covering all aspects.
